author: marioevz
content:
Hi all, we have our first release for the execution-spec-tests (python fillers) here:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/v0.1.0

It contains tests for all Shanghai EIPs and Withdrawals, except for EOF.

`fixtures.tar.gz` contains tests in the BlockchainTests JSON format that can be consumed by the execution clients, and have been tested only with geth at the moment.

EOF tests will come in a subsequent release.
